description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Eintracht Frankfurt vs Stuttgart in the Bundesliga
title: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Stuttgart: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Stuttgart: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt missed. Nnamdi Collins (Eintracht Frankfurt) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Oscar Højlund following a fast break.
Post
Attempt saved. Nnamdi Collins (Eintracht Frankfurt) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Hugo Ekitiké.
Post
Attempt missed. Ramon Hendriks (VfB Stuttgart) header from very close range is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Deniz Undav with a headed pass following a corner.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
